titleStmt.title: A treatise ful of consolation for all that are afflicted in minde, or bodie, or otherwise Which armeth vs against impatiencie vnder any crosse. By Nicolas Bovvnde Doctor of Divinitie.
titleStmt.author: Bownd, Nicholas, d. 1613.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A comfortable treatise for the afflicted.
Also issued at part 2 of: Bownd, Nicholas. The unbeleefe of S. Thomas the apostle, laid open (STC 3441.5 sq.).
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
